org.apache.juneau.rest.client.mock

Class MockHttpClientConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.rest.client.mock.MockHttpClientConnectionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.http.conn.HttpClientConnectionManager
    Deprecated. 
    Use org.apache.juneau.rest.mock2

    @Deprecated
public class MockHttpClientConnectionManager
extends Object
implements org.apache.http.conn.HttpClientConnectionManager
    An implementation of HttpClientConnectionManager specifically for use in mocked connections using the MockHttpConnection class. This implementation is NOT thread safe.
